alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 11:21AM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Buffalo Pass, Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Williams and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 11 AM Today to 5 AM Thursday: Buffalo Pass 4 to 6 inches Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 1 to 3 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Williams 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
